Articles.Content:
Hi so with .22 now released i wanted to start a fresh new save, and cause i hated my old space agency name thing. So i named my space agency Ember and made two flags for it, but i don't know which one to use, so i thought maybe the forums could help me

First flag

Second flag

so which one looks better?
The first one. The other is too cluttered.
First one. I wouldn't even care for the word "ember". Maybe just E, or less detailed font.

The first one. I'd remove the text, though. It's a flag, after all, and a flag should look good from either side.

Edited October 19, 2013 by Felsmak
With flags, minimalism is usually better. Personally I'd take off everything except for the flame itself and center it, maybe have some sort of designs in a circle around it but no more.
I'd have kerbin nearly transparent in the background of the first one.

I'd have kerbin nearly transparent in the background of the first one.

I like that idea. First one, no text + SpaceSphereOfDeath's suggestion.
